title: Ticket #259: Prevent unnecessary consecutive checkpoints
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

This change deals with the case where a job is checkpointing and while doing so recieves another signal telling it to checkpoint. Currently, we end up performing a 2nd checkpoint. The patch avoids this additional checkpoint.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (10).
